layers.name: OS BHA Buildings (i.e. buildings without EPC information)
This layer is the area of interest, i.e. greater King's Lynn area

description:
This point represents a cluster of closely spaced Water Sites.

In this case, at least one location has a non-zero chance of direct failure.

Click to see details on the underlying individual locations.
